>
> I'm on the verge of ordering this book. Any considered opinions?

I am still waiting for O'Reilly to pull their finger out and deliver
my order, so I can't comment directly but here is Jon Udell's
commentary:

http://blog.jonudell.net/2007/05/24/restful-web-services/

Regards,
Alan Dean
